song.title: A Bard's Tale...
song.info:
..A Bard's Tale.. --------------------
.by. ...DipA... ..of RamJam..
=================
This is my first 2000 release. I hope you enjoy this tune, I've worked hard on it...
PLAY THIS SONG ONLY WITH FT2 OR XMPLAY.
Thank you.
================= Some info: ------------ Playtime: 3:46 72 Samples 32 Channels 16Bit Version
=================
Thanx to: Nabo, Awesome, Surfing, Warder, Ciccilleju, Crono, Dixan and to you.
=================
Special thanx go to Federica, my lovely girlfriend...
=================
You can contact me at: dipa_simcity.it and get my latest works from: www.simcity.it/dipa
You can get my songs also from www.modarchive.com and www.traxinspace.com
================= All Rights Reserved. Using this song in commercial products without my authorization is prohibited.
That's all...
SEE YOU AT THE NEXT DIPA'S MOD!
=================
